Title: MVT Charts for Silverlight
HomeWiki:
MVT ChartLibrary for Silverlight is a Silverlight based Chartlibrary, which contains 10 Charts for different data presentation.

The charts are Linecharts, Column- and Barcharts, Areacharts and Piecharts.

There are also animations for the Chart, which can be used.

This Project isn't maintained any more. For other Projects please refer to http://sharepointtrench.com/
